titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller personal papers FA1599

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 03:58:27 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Material in the Rockefeller family collections that provides the names, correspondence, or activities of living members of the Rockefeller family, and/or documents the net wealth of any Rockefeller family members, is restricted. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers are arranged in the following open series:
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Activities, Series A (FA338)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, AIA-IBEC, Series B (FA339)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Art, Series C (FA340)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Countries, Series E (FA341)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, DNA, Series G (FA342)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Family and Friends, Series H (FA343)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Oral Histories, Series I (FA344)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Politics - New York City Office, Series J.1 (FA345)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Politics - George L. Hinman, Series J.2 (FA346)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Politics - Oscar M. Ruebhausen, Series J.3 (FA347)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Possessions, Series K (FA011)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Projects, Series L (FA348)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Speeches, Post-Vice Presidential, Series M (FA349)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Pesonal Papers, Washington, DC, Series O (FA350)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Ann C. Whitman - Politics, Series P (FA351)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Hugh Morrow Interviews, Series Q (FA352)
Nelson A. Rockefeller Personal Papers, Audiovisual Materials, Series R (FA755)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection documents Nelson A. Rockefeller's personal activites outside of his government service.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Rockefeller Archive Center has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them, and has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.
